GSD.product_version: versions from v5.13 to before v5.15.75
GSD.description:
bpf: Fix reference state management for synchronous callbacks

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.75 by commit 4ed5155043c97ac8912bcf67331df87c833fb067, it was introduced in version v5.13 by commit 69c087ba6225b574afb6e505b72cb75242a3d844. For more details please see the references link.
